name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [main, dev ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main, dev ]

jobs:
  build-test:
    runs-on: unbuntu-lastest

    strategy:
      matrix:
	include:
	  # ---Backend (Python) ---
	  - name: backend
	    workdir: backend
	    runtime: python
	    python-version: '3.11'
	  #
